title: Star Wars - The Last Turn to the Dark Side - Episodes 1-3 recut-
description:
At the behest of a few online communities, I took it upon myself to combine two of the most reputable fan-trilogy edits into a single cohesive piece. For reference, the two torrents are located at: 
 <a href="
https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/10132205/Star_Wars_-_A_Last_Hope_-_Episodes_1-3_recut__improved" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/10132205/Star_Wars_-_A_Last_Hope_-_Episodes_1-3_recut__improved</a>
 <a href="
https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/10123363/Star_Wars_-_Turn_to_the_Dark_Side" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/10123363/Star_Wars_-_Turn_to_the_Dark_Side</a>



The cut starts with the beginning of 'A Last Hope' and goes to 01:15:03:11, where I cut and jump to 'Turn to the Dark Side' at 01:19:59:20.

Total Runtime: 162 Minutes

All editing credit goes to whoever GoodFilms sources were.

For encoding information, I went with roughly the same settings as the first source, as it was at a higher bitrate+larger resolution than Turn to the Dark Side. Turn to the Dark Side was also rendered in 29.967 rather than the standard 23.98, so I corrected that as well and upscaled it to match 'A Last Hope's resolution.
